scenario:
Model N, a leader in revenue optimization and compliance for life sciences and high-tech companies, announced the opening of registration for its annual conference, Rainmaker, in celebration of its 25th anniversary. The event will be held in Austin, Texas on May 28-30 and will feature over 40 specialized sessions, product innovation keynotes, customer awards, and certification programs. 

Key highlights include:

- Over 40 specialized sessions across four targeted tracks: Industry Evolution and Strategy for Pharma, Solution Innovation for Pharma, Strategy and Solution Innovation for Medtech, and Strategy and Solution Innovation for High-Tech.
- Executive keynote from CEO Bret Connor on industry trends and Model N's vision for the future.
- Product innovation keynote from Chief Product Officer Suresh Kannan.
- Customer awards celebrating excellence in revenue optimization and compliance.
- Community giveback initiative in partnership with Austin Angels.

Model N has provided revenue optimization and compliance solutions to the world's most innovative brands across life sciences and high-tech, partnering with over 150 pharmaceutical, medtech, and high-tech manufacturers, including all the top 20 global pharmaceutical companies and more than half of the world's top 25 semiconductor companies.

As of January 2025, Model N is trusted across more than 120 countries by the world's leading companies, including Johnson & Johnson, AstraZeneca, Stryker, Seagate Technology, Broadcom, and Microchip Technology.
